DataElement.preferredName: Lymphedema Disease or Disorder Assessment Ind-3
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/unknown indicator related to the assessment of the abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress in the form of excess fluid collection in tissues, causing swelling. It is the result of obstruction of lymphatic vessels or lymph

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An assessment of the abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress in the form of excess fluid collection in tissues, causing swelling. It is the result of obstruction of lymphatic vessels or lymph nodes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Excess fluid collection in tissues, causing swelling. It is the result of obstruction of lymphatic vessels or lymph nodes. -- 2004:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: Excess fluid collection in tissues, causing swelling. It is the result of obstruction of lymphatic vessels or lymph nodes.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.
